mapper.select: SELECT t1.school_account as schoolAccount, t2.school_name as schoolname, t1.pic1 as itemImg, t2.c1_price as itemPrice from school_ad_t t1 LEFT JOIN driver_school_t t2 on t1.school_account=t2.account limit #{0},1

select t1.pic1 as topPIc, t1.school_account as schoolAccount, t2.school_name as schoolName, t1.id as placeId, t1.place_name as placeName, t2.tel as tel, t2.qq as qq, t2.wechat as wechat, t2.c1_price as price, t2.position as schoolAddress, t1.position as placeAddress, t2.buget as bugget, t2.school_info as schoolInfo, t1.remark as placeRemark from school_place_t t1 left join driver_school_t t2 on t1.school_account = t2.account where t1.id = #{0}
